name: Forbidden Insights
description:
A short bullet-hell-like game about unraveling reality, made for The Krass-N.G. Jam 11.

You've seen a truth that mortals weren't meant to see, and you know what you have to do. Defeat and collect abominations. Dodge enemy attacks while your abominations fight for you. Can you succeed, and unravel reality?

Controls:
Arrow Keys - Move
R - Reset Game
Esc - Quit Game
